summary: Adds one of The Unforgivables, Avada Kedavra, to your arsenal of spells!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][center]UPDATED to V1.1[/center]
[/b][/size]
It's late here, please bear with me. I have always wanted a bunch of Harry Potter spells and wand models in a Skyrim mod but never knew how to work the creation kit. After many hours of researching, this incredibly simple mod is my my finished product! Adds 2 new spells and a staff (wand) to High Hrothgar interior

[u][size=3][b]What you get in V1.1![/b][/size][/u]
[list]
[*]New sound FX! Sound like Voldemort!
[*]Avada Kedavra now separated into two different spells 1. Weak Version - Kills NPC's instantly 2. New and improved kill essential version! (Thanks TheSkoomaKing) Both spells are located in the same spot as in the pictures.
[*]Added a wand! Uses vanilla "Shiv" model; located next to the spells. Wand is enchanted with a continuous kill essential avada bolt for you especially dark wizards.
[*]Includes version without sound fx as well
[/list]Known bugs:
[list]
[*]Sound and casting synchronization is meant so you can choose the delay in which Voldemort says, "Avada Kedavra". Play around with the spell and you will see what I mean.
[/list]
OLDER VERSIONS!
-----------------------------------------------------------------
What you get in V1.0!
[list]
[*]Spell "Avada Kedavra - The Killing Curse" added to High Hrothgar interior (Pictures everywhere, no one should have a problem finding it)
[*]Kills Enemies instantly! Just like in the movies! *Gasp*
[*]Spell is OP. I know.
[*]Edited meshes/textures for immersive Harry Potter...er...effects
[*]Costs 250 magika to cast - yes, OP, I know.
[*]Can't think of anything else due to sheer exhaustion[/list]
author: Haxxzor1

files.name: Avada Kedavra - Main
files.changelogHtml:
Added spell to High Hrothgar
Fixed Texture bug
